text: Edward Robert Vrdolyak (; born December 28, 1937) is an American politician an lawyer. He was the Chicago alderman and was also head of the Cook County Democratic Party until 1989, when he ran unsuccessfully for Mayor of Chicago on the Illinois Solidarity Party and Republican Party tickets. ==References== ==Other websites== * Vrdolyak's Career Timeline * Vrdolyak Law Firm Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago City Council members Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Chicago
title: Edward Vrdolyak
